original_text: At this time, I am suffering on your behalf, but I am still happy. Christ himself suffered on behalf of his people, the church. Now, while I live in my human body, I also suffer. I continue to receive the pain that Christ received, so that it may be complete. In that way, I help the church, which is like Christ's own body.
korean_text: 나는 이제 너희를 위하여 받는 괴로움을 기뻐하고 그리스도의 남은 고난을 그의 몸된 교회를 위하여 내 육체에 채우노라

sentences.original_text: At this time, I am suffering on your behalf
sentences.korean_translation: 이 시간에 나는 너희를 위해 고난받고 있지만

sentences.original_text: on behalf of his people, the church
Now, while I live in my human body
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 내가 이 육체 안에 사는 동안

sentences.original_text: I continue to receive the pain that Christ received
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그리스도가 받은 고통을 계속 받습니다

sentences.original_text: so that it may be complete
In that way, I help the church
which is like Christ's own body
